message: 1. Settings Modal Layout Fix The settings modal previously opened inside the sidebar because of the sidebar's CSS context.
Statistics
feat: add statistics page with usage metrics and charts
feat: add header and github history link to activity log
Removed temp files
chore: remove activity log pagination and category bulk edit feature
fix: revert sonar-scan-action to v6 and disable incompatible test report path
fix: resolve SonarQube build issues and enhance UpdatePrompt with multi-commit history and GitHub link
Fix SonarQube CI/CD issue by using JUNIT XML format
Fix test failures: Update mock setup and correct test expectations for useFirestoreSync
Lint fixes
Fix PWA build error: Change registerType from 'prompt' to 'autoUpdate' to avoid workbox-window import issue
Fix vulnabirities
MC
Fix build errors: Add missing state variables for bulk edit feature in CategorySection
Fix build errors: Add missing state variables in CategorySection and type annotations in AppContext
Expand testing coverage: Add integration tests for useFirestoreSync hook using Vitest
Improve error handling: Add ErrorBoundary components in App.tsx and AppContext.tsx
Add bulk edit feature: Multi-select lists for delete and move operations in CategorySection
Optimize performance: Add React.memo to CategoryView and ListDetail components
